name: Compact ISO File
summary: Learn about .CISO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: CISO files are commonly used to store Wii games. The CISO file is the same as an .ISO file except it is compact, which means it removes all the "junk data" used to pad Wii games to make them appear as full discs. The CISO format features password based encryption and digital signing for software distribution.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
